resources.string:
This was written in all it's bad UI 
glory by me, Geoff Craig. 
All photos are provided by the Flickr. 
 
Any similarities to code living or dead 
is purely accidental, expect where commented. 
 
Special thanks to our professor Josh Bond

Welcome! 

Go to the Photo tab to see photos from Flickr. 

If you see one you like click it and favorite it. 

Go to the Favorites tab to see all your favorites. 

Go to the Settings tab to set a list of search terms 

I hope you enjoy the FlickrLiker!
Enter up to three search terms
